faqs.q: How many calories are in half a banana?
faqs.a: About 52 kcal for half a medium banana.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in half a banana?
faqs.a: Approximately 13.5 g carbs, including 1.6 g fiber and 7.2 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is half a banana low calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, at ~52 kcal, it's a light snack with natural energy from carbs.

faqs.q: How does banana size affect calories?
faqs.a: Smaller bananas have fewer calories (e.g., ~42 kcal whole), larger more (e.g., ~121 kcal whole).

faqs.q: Are there fats or protein in half a banana?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.2 g fat and 0.7 g protein; mostly carb-based.
